criterion_0_program.reasoning: Clear program name identified: 'Building Pathways Out of Poverty for Ultra-poor IDPs and Vulnerable Host Communities in Baidoa'

criterion_0g_graduation.reasoning: Program has both core graduation components: unconditional cash transfers (not loans) and direct provision of productive assets (livestock and start-up assets). Program targets ultra-poor populations, consistent with graduation approach.
